front.sen: Nowadays, there is a widespread concern over the issue that %n1 became popular.

When asked about %n1,the vast majority of people say that %n1 is %a1, but I think a bit differently.

mid.sen: There are a few main reasons to explain why %n1 is likely to be %a1.

end.sen: From what has been mentioned above, It is not difficult to draw the conclusion that %n1 is becoming more and more %a1.
There isn't a foolproof strategy for %n1.We still have a long way to go.
Whatever you do please remember those, if you underatand it and apply it to your daily life , you will necessart benefit a lot from it.
